パッケージ org.interledger.cryptoconditions

Contains classes related to Crypto Conditions.

参照先: 説明

  • インタフェースのサマリー 
    インタフェース 説明
    CompoundCondition
    Compound conditions extend regular conditions by defining the subtypes of all sub-conditions.
    Condition
    An implementation of a crypto-conditions Condition.
    Fulfillment<C extends Condition>
    An implementation of a crypto-conditions Fulfillment.
    SimpleCondition
    The SimpleCondition is a marker interface to distinguish between simple and compound conditions.
  • クラスのサマリー 
    クラス 説明
    CompoundSha256Condition
    An abstract implementation of CompoundCondition that extends Sha256Condition to provide common functionality for all compound condition classes.
    ConditionBase
    This class provides shared, concrete logic for all conditions.
    CryptoConditionReader
    Provides utility methods to read a crypto-condition from DER encoding.
    CryptoConditionUri
    This class is responsible for parsing a uri-formatted crypto-condition.
    CryptoConditionUri.QueryParams  
    CryptoConditionWriter
    Provides utility methods to read a crypto-condition from DER encoding.
    Ed25519Sha256Condition
    Implementation of a crypto-condition using the ED-25519 and SHA-256 functions.
    Ed25519Sha256Fulfillment
    An implementation of Fulfillment for a crypto-condition fulfillment of type "ED25519-SHA256" using the ED-25519 and SHA-256 functions.
    FulfillmentBase<C extends Condition>
    This class provides shared, concrete logic for all conditions.
    NamedInformationUri
    Provides utility methods related to named information (ni://) URI's.
    PrefixSha256Condition
    Implementation of a crypto condition based on a prefix, a sub-condition and the SHA-256 function.
    PrefixSha256Fulfillment
    Implementation of a fulfillment based on a prefix, a sub fulfillment, and the SHA-256 function.
    PreimageSha256Condition
    This type of condition is also called a "hashlock".
    PreimageSha256Fulfillment
    An implementation of Fulfillment for a crypto-condition fulfillment of type "PREIMAGE-SHA-256" based upon a preimage and the SHA-256 hash function.
    RsaSha256Condition
    Implementation of a condition based on RSA PKI and the SHA-256 function.
    RsaSha256Fulfillment
    An implementation of Fulfillment for a crypto-condition fulfillment of type "RSA-SHA-256" based upon an RSA key and the SHA-256 function.
    Sha256Condition
    Abstract base class for the *-SHA-256 condition rsa.
    ThresholdSha256Condition
    Implements a condition based on a number of subconditions and the SHA-256 function.
    ThresholdSha256Fulfillment
    An implementation of Fulfillment for a crypto-condition fulfillment of type "THRESHOLD-SHA-256" based upon a number of sub-conditions and sub-fulfillments.
  • 列挙型のサマリー 
    列挙型 説明
    CryptoConditionType
    Enumeration of crypto-condition rsa.
    NamedInformationUri.HashFunction
    From https://www.iana.org/assignments/hash-function-text-names/hash-function-text-names.xhtml

パッケージorg.interledger.cryptoconditionsの説明

Contains classes related to Crypto Conditions.
関連項目:
"https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-thomas-crypto-conditions/"
